english.title: The Story Has No End
text: The story has no end for a child inside of me who hoped to live one day and the story has no end
Just now I knew that it's written on my forehead that what the past isn't forgotten
And the past is still able to live. It was a story and I lived in it my life and days
But fate didn't approve. You can die. You can live

arabic.title: تسمحيلي
text: آه لو تسمحيلي آه لو تسمحيلي
من دون ما ندرى ايه بيجرى

english.title: Would you ?
text: Would you allow me a second dance ?
Would you allow me a second chance ?
Oh, If you would allow me
Eagerness is rising in every step
Hold me closer to your heart
Play for me the best song there is
Over the beaches of love we land
Only if you would allow me a second dance
There's so much I want to say to you
And the whole night isn't enough
My heart speaks about his love
If your eyes would let it
But my fear it would tell me not yet
If you would allow me a second dance
would you allow me a second chance

arabic.title: معاك في حلمك
text: خليك معايا انا و انت نقدر
احنا جيل في صوت واحد بنقول
احنا طريق اجباري ماشي و لسه كتير

english.title: By your side to your dream*
text: Here is tomorrow calling for us
n' far away we will take you.
An opportunity from you will let us go,
will let us find a new way.
to draw our bout, to walk all the way,
Be with me, together we can
My dream and yours will grow bigger.
We are a generation that says in one voice:
(We are) by your side toward your dream1
We are by your side in what bothers you
(We are) by your side toward your dream1
We are by your side in what bothers you
We are a "one way road" moving all the way long
We are a tale is just beginning
We are a history to be told to (next) generations
We are not a young generation
We are a generation that can change
We are the fate (but) with no conditions
We are too strong to submit2
We are a wall against yesterday
We are a light wandering in tomorrow
n'd we will make it no matter whaaaaaaaat
We will make it no matter whaaaaaaaat
(We are) by your side toward your dream1
We are by your side in what bothers you
(We are) by your side toward your dream1
We are by your side in what bothers you

arabic.title: هحكي عنّك
text: للي فاضل من صحاابي ومن وجيراني

english.title: I Will Tell Tales of You
text: After you went away from me really
you were closer than you were
You left your scent among my clothes
left your worries among my burdens
left your days in my day
You left your voice surrounding me
left your image in the mirror
although you are not with me
I will tell tales about you
to the remainder of my friends and neighbors
to the rest of my years
To the rest of what remains for me after you left
After we've forgotten what we had
I will tell tales of you to the places
whenever I walk in a place
where we took a photo in the past
I will tell tales of you when I get sick,
to the doctors and to the medicine
I will tells of you to the hopes
I will tell tales of you to you

arabic.title: قلبي يحدثني |Qalby Yohadethony
text: روحي فِداكَ عرَفْتَ أمَ لم تَعْرِفِ
ما لي سِوَى روحي وباذِلُ نفسِهِ
في حُبّ مَن يَهْواهُ ليسَ بِمُسرِف
روحي بها تَصبو إلى مَغْنىً خَفي
ما للنّوَى ذنْبٌ ومَنْ أهوَى مَعي
إن غابَ عن إنسانِ عيني فهْوَ في
لو أَنّ رُوحي في يدي وَوَهَبْتُها
من حيثُ فيه عصَيتُ نهْيَ مُعنِّفي
مني لَهُ ذُلّ الخَضُوعِ ومنهُ لي

english.title: My heart reveals to me
text: Translation (to the spirit, not to the letter because this is supremely difficult to translate):
My heart reveals to me, that you are my corruptor
My soul is for your redemption, whether you know it, or not
I Have nothing but my soul and the person who sacrifices himself
In the love of the person he adores, is never wasteful
The eye loves a visage of beauty that, my soul attains a hidden meaning with
The rain has no guilt, when the person that I love is with me
If it vanishes for a human, they're in my eye
For passion remains, and reunion is my temporizer
And patience is mortal, and congress is my detainer My detainer
If my soul was is in my hand, and I decided to gift it To the harbinger of your coming, I wouldn't do them justice Don't think me in love a phony, my blush with your coming is without artifice
I concealed your love, and it dressed me with grief Then, I swear upon my life, I nearly vanished Trepressed it from me, for if I revealed it I would find it more hidden than invisible amiability
For passion remains, and reunion is my temporizer And patience is mortal, and congress is my detainer My detainer
Passion defeated me, sol obeyed the command of my longing And in that process I defied the inhibition of my reprover From me to them. (from me to them) the humiliation of submission
And from them to me, the proudness of deniance and the might of a debilitator
For passion remains, and reunion is my temporizer And patience is mortal, and congress is my detainer My detainer
